title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 ยง 21.16 - Exhaustion of military leave with pay
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 ยง 21.16 - Exhaustion of military leave with pay

State Regulations

Upon exhaustion of military leave with pay provided
pursuant to section 242 of the New York State Military Law, an employee holding
a position designated as overtime ineligible may be granted leave with pay
without charge to leave credits for any period(s) of less than a workweek
during which such employee is ordered to temporary military
duty. Notes

21.16

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
